publications.title: Biomedical Applications of Bismuth Vanadate Nanoparticles: A Review
publications.authors: Ihsan Ullah, Mustafa Kamal, Habib unnabi, Adnan Khan, Sayyad Fayaz Ahmad Shah, Hangqing Huang, Subhan Ali, Muhammad Ghayoor, Misbah Gul and Ajmal Shah
publications.journal: Biomed J Sci & Tech Res 62(3)-2025. BJSTR. MS.ID.009743
publications.abstract: This comprehensive review explores the biomedical applications of bismuth vanadate nanoparticles, focusing on their antimicrobial, photocatalytic, and imaging properties.

publications.title: Comparative Study of Antibacterial and Antifungal Activities of Vanadium Oxide Nanoparticles and Punica Granatum Extract
publications.authors: Ansar, R., Naeemullah., Zubair, M., Ahsan, M., Inamuddin., Shah, S.F.A., Javed, S.
publications.journal: ISAR Journal of Agriculture and Biology, 2(10), 45-49
publications.abstract: A comparative analysis of the antimicrobial efficacy of vanadium oxide nanoparticles against Punica granatum extract against various bacterial and fungal strains.

publications.title: Synthesis, characterization, and biological evaluation of indole-based chalcones
publications.abstract: Novel indole-based chalcones synthesized and evaluated for their potential biological activities, with focus on anticancer and antimicrobial properties.

publications.title: Immunoinformatics and Machine Learning in the Evaluation and Identification of Therapeutic Proteins for Multi-Epitope Vaccine Development against Influenza Virus Disease and Immune Response Enhancement
publications.abstract: Computational approach for identifying therapeutic proteins and developing multi-epitope vaccines against influenza virus using immunoinformatics and machine learning.

publications.title: Carbon Dots-Ag nanomaterials biosensors: Synthesis and applications in biological and medicinal fields
publications.abstract: Development of carbon dots-silver nanocomposite biosensors for sensitive detection of biomolecules with applications in diagnostics and medical research.
